{"step_by_step_thinking": "The American Association of Endodontics (AAE) has a glossary of terms that includes various dental and endodontic conditions. Chronic apical periodontitis, acute apical abscess, and symptomatic apical periodontitis are all terms that are included in this glossary. However, the term 'Chronic apical abscess' is not included in the AAE glossary of terms.", "answer_choice": "C"}
